inclusion.criterion: Cytologically confirmed atypical glandular cells of undetermined significance (AGUS)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must be scheduled to undergo complete histologic examination of the cervix by cone biopsy using loop electrosurgical excision procedure with an endocervical curettage, or excisional cone biopsy with or without endocervical curettage, or hysterectomy within 6 months of the initial cytologic diagnosis of AGUS
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No history of cancer of the endometrium, vagina, or cervix
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No pregnant patients who are at high risk for excessive bleeding or preterm labor if a cone biopsy is performed
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No prior cytotoxic chemotherapy for vaginal and/or cervical cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No prior radiotherapy to the vagina or cervix
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No concurrent radiotherapy to the vagina or cervix
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion, tested positive for HPV 16, and is menopausal with no contraception use.
